name: Time Traveling Therapy Ch 1
description:
Part of a course from Heartbeast's RPG course. This is my first attempt to work on an RPG  where you befriend monsters, find out if they have any childhood trauma affecting them as an adult. You'll be able to travel back in time and prevent the trauma from happening as a Time Traveling Therapist.

I'm very proud of the writing, doing the piano parts in the forest, and adding in the humour.

@BOONDev 2018
https://discord.gg/wally

Controls
X = SELECT

Y = BACK
